battery_charging:
Fast charging 15W
Fast wireless charging 10W
Reverse wireless charging 4.5W
body_build: Plastic front, glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus), aluminum frame
body_dimensions: Unfolded: 166 x 72.2 x 6.9 mm Folded: 86.4 x 72.2 x 15.9-17.1 mm
colors: Phantom Black, Green, Lavender, Cream, White, Pink, Gray, Thom Browne Edition, Bespoke Edition, Wooyoungmi Edition, Dream White
cpu: Octa-core (1x2.84 GHz Cortex-X1 & 3x2.42 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A55)
gps: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS
main_camera:
12 MP, f/1.8, 27mm (wide), 1/2.55", 1.4µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS
12 MP, f/2.2, 123˚ (ultrawide), 1.12µm
models: SM-F711B, SM-F711N, SM-F711U, SM-F711U1, SM-F711W, SM-F7110
os: Android 11, upgradable to Android 12, One UI 4.1
sensors: Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
wlan: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot
